title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Aug 12 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Aug 12 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:


Governor Ron DeSantis is under siege from the left. Austin Texas Mayor defies state and institutes mask mandate. Census data is in, get ready for gerrymandering fight. Oil and gas prices increase at record rate. Democrats play down inflation fears. Clay gets invited to go on CNN Chris Cuomo show -- even though he had been banned from the network! After Chicago police turn their backs on her, Mayor Lightfoot does and 180 from defunding the police to increasing budget.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
